verbs.description: giggit (third-person singular simple present giggits, present participle giggiting, simple past and past participle giggited)

entries.meaning: (US, transitive, intransitive) To convey or move rapidly.
examples: Ever since he nearly like to have got her eat up by sharks, by giggiting her off in the boat out to sea when she wa' n't more 'n three years old  [â€¦]
